name: Try That Again
description:
A game for the Bitter Jam using 5 of the tiles from the tiles sheet.

Use the arrow keys (and R to restart the level) over the course of 15 levels to get the jumper across all the platforms to the heart.

Written using Phaser 3, wanted to try a tricky jumping game that let you try your jumps.  It's still a bit too frustrating! Not sure I will continue with it after the Jam.
